name: Slash And Dash (minwater2)
description:
A prototype of an idea I had inspired by Katana Zero and Hyper Light Drifter. The game was only developed for 2 months so game is quite short (10 - 15 mins).

Most visual assets from Unity store but I programmed everything.

Thank you for playing the game and your feedback is welcome.

Solo developed by Minsu Lee
